attributes.action: Review the proposed changes; to ensure a fair, realistic Road Tax for 4x4 vehicles; Firstly, taking into account their necessity in many areas of WORK. ie. Agriculture, Coast Guard, Environment Officers, Forestry, Equine, Emergency service - to name but a few essential services!  and Secondly; many 4x4 vehicles cause no more pollution issues than many other vehicles on the road; ie Sports cars, or less efficient older models! Thirdly; the end consumer would end up paying higher prices for goods & services i.e. Foods, emergency call-outs; to off-set the traders increased costs!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FIRSTLY, the are many fields of WORK & PUBLIC SERVICES for which a 4x4 Vehicle is an ESSENTIAL tool of the trade;& as such,these should not be unduly penalised? For example; Agriculture,Coast Guard,Environment Officers,Horticulture,Forestry, Equine,Vets,Emergency patrols;to name a few! SECONDLY;many 4x4's cause no more pollution/congestion issues than many other vehicles on the road; ie Sports cars,or less efficient older models.
THIRDLY; the end consumer would end up paying higher prices for goods & services i.e.Foods,emergency call-outs; to off-set the traders increased costs!
FINALLY, The nature of 4x4's,having larger engines,mean that more tax is "earnt" already on re-fuelling;so under the "chancellors proposals" only these "targeted" vehicles would be  penalised. 

I would URGE that due consideration is given to the FULL implications of ANY proposed increase in Road Tax costs for 4x4 vehicles;and as such recommend that only FAIR increases be implemented, IN LINE with ALL other vehicle categories.
